plot: A touching and powerful story dealing with the subject of bullying. When Clarissa finds herself crossed off of the best friend list of her best friend, she's at a loss until God speaks.
title: Clarissa's Gift
plot_es: A touching and powerful story dealing with the subject of bullying. When Clarissa finds herself crossed off of the best friend list of her best friend, she's at a loss until God speaks.
plot_en: A touching and powerful story dealing with the subject of bullying. When Clarissa finds herself crossed off of the best friend list of her best friend, she's at a loss until God speaks.
